CustomField.description: Turns on the Preferred Phone functionality that was released in EDA 1.82. This functionality syncs the Preferred Phone field to the Contact's standard Phone field and validates that the value in Preferred Phone exists and has a value.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Sync the Preferred Phone field to the Contact's standard Phone field and validates that the value in Preferred Phone exists and has a value.
CustomField.label: Enable New Preferred Phone Sync
